medical_history.chief_complaint: A mass in the proximal aspect of the right thigh.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The mass was first noticed six weeks prior to evaluation, when the patient experienced 'pressure' in the area while cycling. Initially treated as a likely musculoskeletal injury, the mass slowly enlarged over time.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Remote history of depression and an uncomplicated appendectomy thirty years previously.
medical_history.social_history: Employed as a laboratory manager in a finch aviary for the previous twenty years; no pets and no recent travels. Consumed alcohol socially; denied smoking or drug use.
